txt.en: 'Well done, friend! You sure put away those beers, and just in the nick of time!\n\n'You've now completed stage one, but there are six more to go if you wish to become a member of the Inn League! This is a race for the stout of stomach, not the weak and lazy!'
'Go on and drink! You're lagging behind! You'll never make the Inn League, talking to me!'
Drink six beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink five more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'Oh dear, you look a bit flushed. Are you feeling ill?'
Drink four more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'This is quite disturbing to watch, let me assure you!'
Drink three more beers within the allotted amount of time.
'You're almost done! Don't bother breathing, just finish it!'
Drink two more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink one more beer within the allotted amount of time.
Full and queasy with drink, you should now speak to the Inn League member in front of you.

You have expressed an interest in becoming a member of the Inn League. In order to do so, you must pass their initiation. This is a long race and only the stout of stomach and strong of will can complete it.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>

'So you want to join the Inn League, do you? Well, then perhaps you are worthy, perhaps you are not. The rules are simple.

'The goal is to drink six of the beers there on the table. Strong ones or weak ones, it makes no difference to me! But be sure you let me know you are finished before the time expires.

'Are you ready to start?'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will fail when logging out of the game.</rgb>
